overview: Chased by the Light: A Photographic Journey with Jim Brandenburg tells the story of how one of the world s greatest nature photographers immersed himself in a Zen-like exploration of his craft and the untamed landscape of the rugged north woods.
tagline: Chased by the Light: A Photographic Journey with Jim Brandenburg tells the story of how one of the world s greatest nature photographers immersed himself in a Zen-like exploration of his craft and the untamed landscape of the rugged north woods.
title: Chased by the Light
